attributes.action: build generator dams to block off the Irish sea. Bristol Channel etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vast ammounts of tidal energy could be harnessed by building dams between Northern Ireland & Scotland + Southern Ireland & Wales. Also across the Bristol Channel, the Thames estuary & The Wash.
These would provide this country & Ireland with a large proportion of the required electrical energy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
